body_html:
I did not follow this instruction.
Instead, go to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/libtensorflow_cpu.sh

I think this is the shell script that they use to build windows CPU version .
Use msys64 or any shell to run this script. It should work, or at least the errors will be easy to fix.

Then modify this above script and https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/common_env.sh
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/bazel_test_lib.sh
to change it to GPU build
those files contains some config such as CUDA path.

body:
I did not follow this instruction.
Instead, go to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/libtensorflow_cpu.sh

I think this is the shell script that they use to build windows CPU version .
Use msys64 or any shell to run this script. It should work, or at least the errors will be easy to fix. 

Then modify this above script and https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/common_env.sh
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/bazel_test_lib.sh
to change it to GPU build
those files contains some config such as CUDA path.
